div.p:
A user with the right "Administrator" is able to (de-)activate a trial site. For users of a deactivated trial site it is not possible to log in.
The first step to (de-)activate a trial site is to select it with the "edit" link.
After the selection the trial site can (de-)activated with a click at the menu item "Activate" respectively "Deactivate". It is necessary to confirm the process with a click at the button.
